sub_title: Manager, Enterprise Data at NN Group
summary:
Specialties
Enterprise Data Strategy | Digital Transformation | Program management | Finance Strategy

Currently working as Senior Manager, Enterprise Data Services at Group Finance - NN Group.

Responsible for driving quality, growth, finance, service, and employee engagement goals throughout the organization through line oversight and strategic execution.
Specialized in solving complex problems and business needs in Insurance and Asset management through strategic initiatives & collaboration.

Previous experience includes designing and developing solutions for ABN Amro Bank(NL), Goldman Sachs(UK), SunTrust Bank.

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

projects.title: MEDM(Cadis) Change and Run
projects.description:
Dual role of  Test Manager and Technical Business Specialist for MarkitEDM , liaising with Change, Support(BAU) and Business teams to Test and Deliver various changes and projects on MEDM software releases (8.5 to date).

Continuous enhancement and improvement to the testing approach and strategy to improve overall quality and mitigate issues taking into account the lessons learnt from previous changes/releases. 

Important Projects-
> Implementing new instruments in MEDM 
>MEDM Upgrade(8.5 to 10.0)
>MEDM Upgrade(10 to 11.5)
>MEDM Infrastructure migration to Windows 2012, SQL 2012. 
>Implementing the MEDM Web UI.

contributors.headline: Manager, Enterprise Data at NN Group

projects.title: Test Lead & Release Manager
projects.description:
Role - Test Lead , Release&Environment Manager EQD-Markets 
Client - ABN Amro Bank N.V. , Amsterdam, Netherlands

•Develop and Implement overall Test Framework & Strategy.
•Discuss Test approach and Test Scenarios with various business stakeholders(FrontOffice, BackOffice, Risk, Finance)
•Drive Testing activities by coordinating with various IT teams, business stakeholders, SMEs and offshore teams.
•Tracking the test progress and take timely action.
•Discuss and plan User acceptance testing(UAT) with business stakeholders.
•Release Manager - Manage and Constantly update releases/environments plans after discussions with Delivery Project Managers , Test leads of various streams and Business Stakeholders.

projects.title: Senior Test & Application Support Specialist
projects.description:
Role - Test & Application Support Analyst  EQD-Markets 
Client - ABN Amro Bank N.V. ,  Amsterdam, Netherlands

•Design and develop critical End of Day (EOD) jobs using Power Shell and windows batch scripting
•Design the testing framework , test all the EOD changes for every release.
•Support lead for EOD team working in Netherlands and India.
•Analysis,Job automation and performance tuning of EOD batch.
•Supporting Equity Derivatives Markets applications.

projects.title: Senior Enterprise Data Warehouse Test Analyst
projects.description:
Role - ETL- Informatica Analyst for Solvency II E.U Directive
Client - Atradius Credit Insurance, Amsterdam, Netherlands

•Translate functional design from discussions with Client’s Business team to Technical mapping specifications to  be used by Informatica Power Centre Developers
•Test planning, test strategizing and developing test scripts for both Initial and Incremental Load. 
•Analysing and translating functional requirements into logical test scenarios and test cases.
•Efficient in preparation of logical test sets with utmost test optimization. Participated in feasibility analysis for test automation.

contributors.headline: Manager, Enterprise Data at NN Group

projects.title: Support Analyst for Global Investment Research Technology at Goldman Sachs
projects.description:
Role - Research Application Support Analyst, Programmer,Tester
Client - Goldman Sachs, London

•	Analysis, development, maintenance, support and Test Investment Research applications which requires expertise in report generation, job scheduling, integration, scripting, monitoring and testing various high impact jobs
•	 Manage infrastructures changes that impact the division, coordinating down times and application checkouts
•	Lead global meetings to discuss upcoming changes to the research application platform
•	Co-ordinate environment usage of various parallel testing cycles for different streams in the project
•	Test and highlight past issues to coordinate fixes with developer team leads
•	Batch support and automation for day to day activities.
•	Act as single point of escalation for any application and user issues.
•	Work with business users and developers to build and release new software.
•	Support application platforms (Apache, JBoss) and database platform (Sybase, DB2).
• Support Various Investment Research Applications (Windows,Unix,Linux).
•	Participate in Business Continuity Planning.

projects.title: Application Developer for Commercial Lending at SunTrust Banks Inc.
projects.description:
Role: Software Developer, Application Analyst
Client : SunTrust Banks, USA

•	Developed ETL mappings, Transformations and loading using SSIS (via BIDS) 
•	Environment set up scripts by analyzing applications which interacts with the Lexus-Nexus (vendor) files
•	 integrating various modules taking into account the downstream application behavior.
